append-to.description: Which element the tooltip CONTENT appends
append-to.description_zh: 指示 Tooltip 的内容将附加在哪一个网页元素上

effect.description_zh: Tooltip 主题，内置了 dark / light 两种

content.description: The displayed content can also be passed into the DOM via 'slot#content'
content.description_zh: 显示的内容，也可以通过 `slot#content` 传入 DOM

raw-content.description_zh: content 中的内容是否作为 HTML 字符串处理

value.description: Whether the status is visible or not

:v-model.description: Whether the status is visible or not

:offset.description: The offset of the occurrence position

visible-arrow.description: Whether or not to display the Tooltip arrow, more parameters can be seen in [vue-popper](https://github.com/element-component/vue-popper)
visible-arrow.description_zh: 是否显示 Tooltip 箭头，更多参数可见[Vue-popper](https://github.com/element-component/vue-popper)

manual.description: Manual control mode, when set to true, the mouseenter and mouseleave events will not take effect
manual.description_zh: 手动控制模式，设置为 true 后，mouseenter 和 mouseleave 事件将不会生效

show-after.description_zh: 在触发后多久显示内容，单位毫秒

show-arrow.description: Whether the tooltip content has an arrow
show-arrow.description_zh: tooltip 的内容是否有箭头

popper-class.description: Add a class name to the popper of Tooltip
popper-class.description_zh: 为 Tooltip 的 popper 添加类名

enterable.description: Whether the mouse can enter the tooltip
enterable.description_zh: 鼠标是否可进入到 tooltip 中

auto-close.description: Timeout in milliseconds to hide tooltip
auto-close.description_zh: tooltip 出现后自动隐藏延时，单位毫秒

teleported.description: Whether tooltip content is teleported, if `true` it will be teleported to where `append-to` sets
teleported.description_zh: 是否使用 teleport。设置成 true则会被追加到 append-to 的位置

trigger.description: How should the tooltip be triggered (to show)

virtual-triggering.description: Indicates whether virtual triggering is enabled
virtual-triggering.description_zh: 用来标识虚拟触发是否被启用

virtual-ref.description: Indicates the reference element to which the tooltip is attached
virtual-ref.description_zh: 标识虚拟触发时的触发元素

trigger-keys.description: When you click the mouse to focus on the trigger element, you can define a set of keyboard codes to control the display of tooltip through the keyboard
trigger-keys.description_zh: 当鼠标点击或者聚焦在触发元素上时， 可以定义一组键盘按键并且通过它们来控制 Tooltip 的显示

persistent.description: When tooltip inactive and `persistent` is `false` , popconfirm will be destroyed
persistent.description_zh: 当 tooltip 组件长时间不触发且 persistent 属性设置为 false 时, popconfirm 将会被删除
